title: A Sequel for the Villainess? - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Broken Engagement   Female Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Nobles   Otome Game   Politics   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Shiki
description: After my engagement with the Crown Prince was broken off, I was thrown away in the slums. I started to live as a commoner and yet… Why am I summoned by the King now? I live like a commoner so, please leave me alone. My plans are over…>
